_Remind the caregiver to ensure adheres to treatment._
Tsiku lina loti apite ku chipatala
Kodi anapatsidwanso tsiku lina loti apite kuchipatala?
Tsiku lomwe wodwala akuyenera kupita ku chipatala
_Kumbutsani anthu omwe akupereka chisamaliro kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsatira ndondomeko wa mankhwala omwe apatsidwa._
Kodi anaikidwa pa ndondomeko ya mankhwala?
Kulumikiza anthu ena apabanja kuchipatala pa nkhani ya TB
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Nambala ya EID EMR mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Kodi adakalibe mu program ya EID?
Kodi nambala ya EID EMR ilipo
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
_Kumbutsani anthu omwe akupereka chisamaliro kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsatira ndondomeko ya mankhwala omwe apatsidwa._
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Tsiku lokutha mphamvu za njira yakulerayo
Kodi akugwilitsa ntchito njira yanji yolera?
_**Kulondola anthu a mbanja lomwe mwapezeka munthu wa TB:** _
_Chulukitsani ndi kulimbikitsa $ {c_patient_name} kuti muwone utumiki wa kulera._
_**Kulondola munthu yemwe anatumizidwa ku chipatala kamba kokhala ndi zizindikiro zowopsa:** _
_**Kulondola ana amene abadwa kwa mayi yemwe ali ndi HIV:** _
_** Kulondola munthu yemwe anatumizidwa ku chipatala kuti akayezetse magazi:** _
_**Kulondola ana amene anatumizidwa ku chipatala kamba kokhala ndi zizindikiro zoopsa za matenda a ana aang'ono:** _
_**Kulondola munthu yemwe anatumizidwa ku chipatala kamba kokhala ndi zizindikiro za kunyentchera:** _
_**Kulondola anthu amene anatumizidwa ku chipatala kamba kokhala ndi zizindikiro zoopsa za matenda a mgonagona:** _
_Perekezani mayi kuchipatala amene ali ndi zizizndikiro zoopsa kuti akalandire chithandizo mwachangu._
_Tumizani mwansanga kuchipatala akakhala ndi zizindikiro zoopsa izi!_
Nambala ya ART EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi nambala yopelekedwa kwa munthu amene ali pa ART ilipo?
Kodi wodwalayo anaikidwa pa ndondomeko ya mankhwala?
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
_Kumbutsani anthu omwe akupereka chisamaliro kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsatira ndondomeko ya mankhwala omwe apatsidwa._
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Zotsatira za kuyezetsa kachilombo ka HIV ndi zotani?
Kodi 's akupeza bwanji kuchokera pamene anapita kuchipatala?
_Kumbutsani wosamalira mwana kuti adzimwa mankhwala mwa ndondomeko ._
Kodi anapita ku chipatala kukalandira mankhwala?
Kufufuza za matenda osiyanasiyana a ana ang'ono
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china
Kodi analowetsedwa mu pologalamu iti ya kunyentchera
Kumbutsani mayi kupereka zakudyazi kwa mwana yekhayo yemwe ndi wonyentchera
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi nambala yopelekedwa kwa munthu amene ali pa matenda a mgonagona ilipo?
Onaninso pasipoti ya thanzi ya mtundu wa thanzi labwino.
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
Kodi anatsimikizika kuti ali ndi matenda amgonagona?
Nambala ya NCD EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Zitsanzo- nthenda yokutha magazi, nthenda ya chiwindi, kufa ziwalo, nthenda youmitsa mafupa
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi wayikidwa pa ndondomeko ya mankhwala?
Chonde tsimikizirani za zotsatira za pakati kuchokera mu buku la chipatala
Sitingakhale ndi ulendo woyamba wa ANC pamaso pa LMP kapena maulendo angapo a ANC omwe adapezekapo tsiku limodzi kapena mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina la ANC
Sitingakhale ndi maulendo angapo a ANC omwe amapezeka tsiku limodzi kapena mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina la ANC
Sitingakhale ndi maulendo angapo a ANC omwe amapezeka tsiku limodzi kapena mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina la ANC
Sitingakhale ndi maulendo angapo a ANC omwe amapezeka tsiku limodzi kapena mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina la ANC
Tsimikizani za ma ulendo a kusikelo powona buku la ku chipatala
Wayenda maulendo angati akusikelo ya amai oyembekezera kufikira pano?
Kupwetekwa kwa mutu, chizungulire kapena nkhungu m'maso
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale chizindikilo china chowopysa
Kodi mai oyembekezera akuwona zizindikiro zoopsa izi?
Kodi mai akudziwa Tsiku lomwe anasamba komaliza?
Tsiku losamba lomaliza lisapitilire miyezi 9 yapitayo kapena mtsogolomo
Kodi 's nsambo wake womaliza anayamba liti?
_Tumizani/pelekezani mayi oyembekezela ku sikelo kuti iye ndi mwana wake akhale anthanzi ndi kukonzekela kuchira._
_Limbikitsani () kuti apite ku chipatala kuti akalandire thandizo._
Kuwonetsetsa kuti ntchito yotumiza kuchipatala yonse yamalizidwa
_Kumbutsani anthu omwe akupereka chisamaliro kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsatira ndondomeko wa mankhwala omwe apatsidwa._
Kodi anaikidwa pa ndondomeko ya mankhwala?

bind.constraint: decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 ) and decimal-date-time(.) > decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 )

bind.calculate: if(../edd < today(), 'EDD cannot be in the past.', if(difference-in-months( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date , ../edd) > 10, 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.', 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.'))

if(../edd < today(), 'Tsiku silingakhale la mbuyo.', if(difference-in-months( /referral_follow_up/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date , ../edd) > 10, 'EDD sikuyenera kupitilira miyezi 10 kuchokera ku LMP. Lowetsani EDD yolondola.', 'EDD sikuyenera kupitilira miyezi 10 kuchokera ku LMP. Lowetsani EDD yolondola.'))

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'bleeding') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fever') or selected(../danger_signs, 'headache_dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'lower_abdominal_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convulsions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'water_bag_breaks'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'constipation') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nausea') or selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_cramps') or selected(../danger_signs, 'haemorrhoids') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')
if(selected(../../referral_completion/attended, 'yes'), 'Went to the health facility', 'Did not go to the health facility')
if(selected(../../danger_sign/treated, 'yes'), 'Was put on treatment', 'Not put on treatment')
if(selected(../../imci/treated, 'yes'), 'Was put on treatment', 'Not put on treatment')
if(selected(../../hiv/test_outcome, 'positive'), 'Positive HIV result', if(selected(../../hiv/test_outcome, 'negative'), 'Negative HIV result', 'HIV test not done'))
if(selected(../../eid/enrolled_in_eid, 'yes'), 'Enrolled in EID program', 'Not enrolled in EID program')
if(selected(../../tb/put_on_treatment, 'yes'), 'Was put on TB treatment', 'Not put on TB treatment')
if(selected(../../contact_tracing/put_on_treatment, 'yes'), 'Was put on treatment', 'Not put on treatment')

bind.relevant: selected(../../danger_sign/treated, 'yes') or selected(../../pregnancy_confirmation/pregnant, 'yes') or selected(../../malnutrition/malnutrition_confirmed, 'yes') or selected(../../imci/treated, 'yes') or selected(../../ncds/ncd_confirmed, 'yes') or selected(../../hiv/hiv_test_outcome, 'positive') or selected(../../eid/enrolled_in_eid, 'yes') or selected(../../tb/put_on_treatment, 'yes') or selected(../../contact_tracing/put_on_treatment, 'yes')

selected(../../danger_sign/treated, 'yes') or selected(../../pregnancy_confirmation/pregnant, 'yes') or selected(../../malnutrition/malnutrition_confirmed, 'yes') or selected(../../imci/treated, 'yes') or selected(../../ncds/ncd_confirmed, 'yes') or selected(../../hiv/hiv_test_outcome, 'positive') or selected(../../eid/enrolled_in_eid, 'yes') or selected(../../tb/put_on_treatment, 'yes') or selected(../../contact_tracing/put_on_treatment, 'yes')
